text: The Bow of Loren is strung with the hair of Elf maids and enchanted with potent charms for increased power.
The Bow of Loren
Sceolan carries a buckler instead of an ordinary shield. This is a small shield with a spiked front, the spikes are arranged in an arcane pattern
The Buckler
Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.
Great Eagle
The eldest, most powerful Dragons can destroy entire units with a molten blast of their white-hot breath.
Star Dragon
Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
Skeletal Steed
The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
Skeleton Chariot
Hailing from deep within the forests of the Old World, this dragon breathes deadly, poisonous fumes instead of fire.
Forest Dragon
True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.
Dark Steed
The corrupted Dark Pegasi fly south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains to make their nests.
Dark Pegasus
Secretly nurtured by Malekith, Black Dragons are enchanted with Dark Magic that corrupts and enhances.
Black Dragon
Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.
Tzeentch Chariot
It is to the Plain of Bones that a Vampire Lord travels to claim a Zombie Dragon as their mount.
Zombie Dragon
Karitamen’s signature weapon, anyone touched by their edges usually died an honourable death in battle
Blades of Honourable Demise
The Death Scarab’s head and torso were completely protected from the elements and at least partially preserved against the ravages of time.
Karitamen's Death Mask

The Inferno Frostplate is an experimental armor forged from the combination of Chaosfire Emberstone and Frostforged Ironclad Ore. This enigmatic plate offers an intriguing blend of fiery and glacial protection.
Inferno Frostplate

The Magmaforged Granite Gauntlets are an experimental set of armored gloves crafted by melding Karakite Granite and Magmaforged Obsidian Shards. These gauntlets offer unparalleled protection due to the density of the Karakite Granite, which is further enhanced by the obsidian's molten properties.
Magmaforged Granite Gauntlets

The Shimmering Leviathan Amulet is a small, pendant-like trinket crafted through the fusion of Shimmerhorn's radiant qualities and Leviathan Blubber's repulsive aura. This mystical amulet, when worn, emanates an ever-changing, shimmering glow that can captivate the onlooker's attention.
Shimmering Leviathan Amulet
